Counter-Strike: Global Offensive review
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Pros:
+FPS
+Balanced teams
+Prime Status is guaranteed to be zero cheaters
+Overall a good game idea
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Cons:
-Meeting cheaters frequently (if you don't have Status Prime)
-Some skins cost too much
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Do I recommend Counter-Strike: Global Offensive?
Yes

Do I recommend Status Prime?
Yes
i played for such a long time and yet never made it past silver 2

Counter Strike: Global Offensive é um ótimo jogo FPS, não precisa de um PC da Nasa pra jogar, requer apenas treino. Tirando a parte tóxica da comunidade é um jogo que eu verdadeiramente gosto de jogar diariamente. 8.5/10 (Devido a comunidade tóxica e ao sistema de loot box, que é absurdamente caro).
SUPER GRA NAJLEPSZA NIE MA LEPRZEJ STRZELANKI
Very good game, loving it. But please do something about the anti cheat system and dont make it possible for hackers to hack. :(

best game ever.........if you love multiplayer games......csgo is the best

Game is good just a little buggy.. I shoot through on enemy head without dealing any damage.. The hitbox system is very bad.. is remarkably away from the player model.
I never see so many cheaters like here. Valve does not do anything again it. VAC is totally useless. I play just danger zone so the report system does not make any sense at all. There is few player with spinbot which i meet again and again for months.. quertel of the players uses wallhack, they follow me trough any walls/grass or just simply shoot trough all the walls for a headshot.
I don not recommend to spend any money for this game while so many cheaters are playing.
